data.eml:eml: All records of invertebrates, excluding insects, recorded up to 31 December 2017. Data includes records collected directly from individual recorders, as well as those collected by the Highland Biological Recording Group (HBRG), including all those held on the database at IMAG.OHBR maintains a regional database of records of the flora, fungi and fauna of the Outer Hebrides and the surrounding marine areas.
